desc: The Good Vibes Dog Training Aid or Harness are designed for the average dog owner that is struggling with various dog behavior problems like jumping, harassing, digging, barking, etc. The Trainer is a remote controlled mini vibrator located on a comfortable strap around the dogs waist which makes it highly effective.

layout.text: Good Vibes Dog Trainer SAFELY CONTROL Jumping - Barking - Biting - Bullying Pulling on Leash Etc.

This NEW product uses a mini vibrator worn around the dogs waist or chest for maximum effectiveness. Say goodbye to Shock  Collars because this dog training device is as effective but absolutely No Pain. The mild vibration distracts the dog from whatever bad behavior they are doing. Combine stimulation with a code word to reinforce commands like "Down" or "Leave It"
